EmailTemplate.name: MYA_BRD_MRT_1701_NCF_form_and_triggerd_coupon.2.1 Email - Invitation eDM.Email -
EmailTemplate.subject: New year, new parties!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Having trouble viewing this email? View in Web Browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]>.
<[[https://www.facebook.com/Martell.MY/]]>
Party like it’s 2017!
The year of the Rooster has arrived and with it the dawn of more brazen Martell NCF parties. Now the question is, are you ready to see the light with us?
Say yes to awesome parties and DJ showdowns like you’ve never seen before. Join us on Friday 20th January at Zion Club for another battle of the DJs.
If you’ve not signed up for your coupon already*, do it here <[[http://marketing.pernod-ricard-asia.com/MYA_BRD_MRT_1701_NCF_form_and_triggerd_coupon_Page---Registration.html]]> and redeem complimentary Martell NCF Cocktails with your e-coupon. Come early to redeem your drink.
Party with us at Zion Club KL <[[http://marketing.pernod-ricard-asia.com/MYA_BRD_MRT_1701_NCF_form_and_triggerd_coupon_Page---Registration.html]]>
*T/C If you have signed up before, please check your inbox to find the coupon sent to you.
<[[https://www.facebook.com/martell]]>
<[[https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCdVXhxfLa-zc7OUaoiUcsBA]]>
<[[https://www.pinterest.com/martell/]]>
<[[https://twitter.com/martellcognac]]>
If you no longer wish to receive these emails you may unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> at any time.
